tags.summary: Epson Inkjet Printer Driver (ESC/P-R) for Linux
tags.description:
This software is a filter program used with Common UNIX Printing System (CUPS) from the Linux. This can supply the high quality print with Seiko Epson Color Ink Jet Printers.
This product supports only EPSON ESC/P-R printers. This package can be used for all EPSON ESC/P-R printers.
For detail list of supported printer, please refer to below site: http://avasys.jp/english/linux_e/
tags.pre: #### %create_opt_dirs in rpmmacors #### mkdir /opt 2>/dev/null || true mkdir /etc/opt 2>/dev/null || true mkdir /var/opt 2>/dev/null || true
tags.post: /sbin/ldconfig #### replace value defined in rpmmacors ##### supplier=epson-inkjet-printer-escpr _cupsppd=/opt/${supplier}/ppds #### %set_ppd_links in rpmmacors #### ppddir=/usr/share/ppd # Remove old links to PPD file directory [ -h $ppddir/${supplier}/ppds ] && rm -f $ppddir/${supplier}/ppds [ -h $ppddir/${supplier} ] && rm -f $ppddir/${supplier} # Make PPD files available to CUPS ln -sf ${_cupsppd} $ppddir/${supplier} 2>/dev/null || true #### %restart_cups in rpmmacors #### if [ -x /etc/init.d/cups ]; then cups="cups" else if [ -x /etc/init.d/cupsys ]; then cups="cupsys" fi fi if [ ! -z "$cups" ]; then if [ -x "`which invoke-rc.d 2>/dev/null`" ]; then invoke-rc.d $cups restart 2>/dev/null || true else /etc/init.d/$cups restart 2>/dev/null || true fi fi
